1. Define a Weblogic server in Servers View, add a dynamic web project
2. Debug weblogic server
3. After server started, go to Debug Perspective, open Debug View
4. Right click the process starting the Server, e.g.:
D:/bea/user_projects/domains/cust_domain/bin/startWeblogic.cmd
5. Select "Properties"
The property dialog reports exception.

Looks like this is an issue in ProcessPropertyPage.getTimeText(): the call to "matcher.group(0);" on 168 is throwing an IllegalStateException if no match was found for the specified regexp (which is the case for this process - the label is just the path of the startWebLogic.cmd script; looks like the logic is assuming StandardVMRunner.renderProcessLabel() is used to create the IProcess label). I believe it should default appropriately for the no-match case.

Here is the stack:
